metadata.title: CVE-2022-1615 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
In Samba, GnuTLS gnutls_rnd() can fail and give predictable random values.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1615` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.18.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2
libnss-winbind - 2:4.18.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2
